mapper.select: select nn.requrit_no as requritNO, nn.requrit_title as requritTitle, nn.requrit_start as requritStart, nn.requrit_end as requritEnd, nn.requrit_career as requritCareer, nn.requrit_gender as requritGender, nn.requrit_field as requritGender, nn.requrit_detail as requritDetail, nn.employee_type as employeeType from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from ( select * from teacher_requrit order by requrit_no desc)n)nn where rnum BETWEEN 1 and 10
